title: Why does the client suck so much after 10 years?
body:
Sometimes I cant change my runes
sometimes the champion select page doesn't even load?
The friend's list doesn't show my friends unless they are online. 
**Ever thought about** _fixing it_ **@rito**

{{sticker:sg-janna}}

replies.body:
Because Riot doesn't care....

Could look at the hots client for ideas,
could implement some of that programming from the new games they've released,
but no.... they just, dont, care.

Just pay attention to the EULA where it says you are responsible for how the game behaves. They put all the blame on the user in the EULA.

**RE Rune Pages:**
It has been reported that a clean reinstall can resolve it. It's not a guaranteed fix but it has fixed it for some. The easiest way to run a clean reinstall is via the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool).

**RE Champion Select:**
I'm not aware of any global issues with this at the moment, so it could be either local to you or just affecting a smaller population. The same clean reinstall may resolve this issue, but it could also be connection or other related. Do you get any error messages? Crashes? Describe in detail what happens when you are prevented from entering champion select and I'll see what info I can find for you.

**RE Friends List:**
This issue is resolved for many (unfortunately not all) people by running a clean reinstall *and* resyncing and automating their computer clock. For Windows 10 you can do this by searching "Date and Time" in the start menu, opening the settings menu that comes up, turning on "Set time automatically" and "Set time zone automatically" and then pressing the "Sync Now" button.

As this poor soul has stated. Additionally I am sick of being slapped with time penalties and the LP reductions for "dodging" because the fucking client hasn't loaded me into champ select. Fuck off Riot and take your shitty fucking cum stained client with you. FUCK
